casebody.data:
Russell F. WALKER
v.
KNATS CREEK NURSERY, INC. No. 39P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Russell F. Walker, for Walker, Russell F. Arthur M. Blue, Attorney at Law, Carthage, for Knats Creek Nursery, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 16th of July 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of July 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed as an Indigent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
